mapper.select: SELECT C.CON_ID , AT.CON_ID , AT.SEQ , AT.ALT_DIV , AT.ALT_CON_DATE , AT.CON_ST_DATE , AT.CON_ED_DATE , AT.SUPP_AMT , AT.VAT_AMT , AT.REMARK , AT.CONFIRM_YN , AT.CON_NO , CU.CUST_NM FROM BM_CON_INFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CON_ALT AT ON C.CON_ID = AT.CON_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_CUST_INFO CU ON C.CUST_ID = CU.CUST_ID WHERE C.CON_ID = #{value}
